caption.p: Allelopathic effects of dichloromethane (DCM), Chloroform (Chl), Ethyl acetate (EtOAc), and ethanol (EtOH) extracts from S. atropurpurea L. stem on the germination ( A, B), shoot length ( C, D), root length ( E, F), and hydration ( G, H) of Lens culinaris Medik. (lens) and Brassica oleracea gongylodes (kohlrabi). Significant difference, one-way ANOVA, p < 0.05.
